title.rendered: Official Durban University of Technology Handbook 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The Durban University of Technology Handbook consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • Durban University of Technology admission process.

Our Handbook outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at Durban University of Technology based on the information provided within it.

Note: Durban University of Technology’s Handbook is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

Durban University of Technology Handbook 2024

The Durban University of Technology  Handbook is now available for download on the college’s official website, www.dut.ac.za/.

Durban University of Technology Handbook 2024 – PDF Download Now

See also Official Mangosuthu University of Technology Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
